txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The Enemy is once again on the march, this time to the south. A concerted force approaches Walstow from the north, south, and east. The town has already suffered great losses. Without reinforcement it may not last this battle. If Walstow falls, the southern gate into Rohan belongs to the Enemy.\n\n'You must aid Walstow and stand with its defenders. It cannot fall.'
'They will come again, they always come again, but for tonight the people of Walstow can sleep secure.'
'Are you prepared to withstand the Enemy's assault at Walstow?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Defence of Walstow: Eye of the Storm
Walstow has been surrounded on all sides by an army of Orcs and trolls.
Defeated Orcs and trolls in the defence of Walstow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Orcs and trolls in the defence of Walstow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orcs and trolls are attacking Walstow.\n\nWaldeg asked you to join in the defence of Walstow, protecting it from an army of Orcs and trolls.
Waldeg is at Snowbourn.\n\nWaldeg will be pleased to hear that Walstow has been defended.
